rules.natural: If the Lead Designer was assigned to work on the Game Design, then the Studio launched the Finished Game.
If the QA Team delayed the Testing Phase, then the Art Team did not complete the Character Models.
If the Development Team implemented the Core Mechanics, then the Studio launched the Finished Game.

rules.prover9_expression: (reviewed(ProjectManager, MilestoneReport) -> (-(optimized(DevTeam, GameEngine) -> implemented(DevTeam, CoreMechanics)) -> hired(Studio, ContractDevelopers)))
rules.natural: If the Project Manager reviewed the Milestone Report, then under the condition that the Development Team optimizing the Game Engine does not lead to the Development Team implementing the Core Mechanics, the Studio hired Contract Developers.
Should the Lead Designer not being assigned to work on the Game Design not lead to Management approving the Design Document, then the Art Team completed the Character Models.
Given that the Lead Designer not being assigned to work on the Game Design does not result in Management approving the Design Document, then the QA Team delayed the Testing Phase.

facts.natural: The Development Team optimized the Game Engine.
The Project Manager reviewed the Milestone Report.
Management did not approve the Design Document.
The Studio did not hire Contract Developers.

target.natural: The Studio launched the Finished Game.

steps.natural: When the Lead Designer not being assigned to work on the Game Design fails to lead to Management approving the Design Document, then the Art Team did not complete the Character Models.
If the Lead Designer was not assigned to work on the Game Design, then Management approved the Design Document.
The Lead Designer was assigned to work on the Game Design.
The Studio launched the Finished Game.
Provided that the Development Team optimizing the Game Engine does not result in the Development Team implementing the Core Mechanics, then the Studio hired Contract Developers.
If the Development Team optimized the Game Engine, then the Development Team implemented the Core Mechanics.
The Development Team implemented the Core Mechanics.
The Studio launched the Finished Game.

(A1 → G).natural: If the Lead Designer was assigned to work on the Game Design, then the Studio launched the Finished Game.

(A4 → ¬A3).natural: If the QA Team delayed the Testing Phase, then the Art Team did not complete the Character Models.

(A5 → G).natural: If the Development Team implemented the Core Mechanics, then the Studio launched the Finished Game.

(A6 → A5).natural: If the Development Team optimized the Game Engine, then the Development Team implemented the Core Mechanics.

(A8 → (¬(A6 → A5) → A7)).prover9_expression: (reviewed(ProjectManager, MilestoneReport) -> (-(optimized(DevTeam, GameEngine) -> implemented(DevTeam, CoreMechanics)) -> hired(Studio, ContractDevelopers)))
(A8 → (¬(A6 → A5) → A7)).natural: If the Project Manager reviewed the Milestone Report, then under the condition that the Development Team optimizing the Game Engine does not lead to the Development Team implementing the Core Mechanics, the Studio hired Contract Developers.

(¬(A6 → A5) → A7).natural: Provided that the Development Team optimizing the Game Engine does not result in the Development Team implementing the Core Mechanics, then the Studio hired Contract Developers.
